snippet: American acceptance of the European Union code of conduct for space would constitute a form of unilateral disarmament.
abstract: Op-Ed article by co-authors John R Bolton and John C Yoo criticizes the Obama administration for declaring that America will follow a European Union code of conduct for outer space; warns decision will erode America's sovereignty in space; contends the administration is circumventing the Senate's central constitutional role in making treaties.

byline.original: By JOHN R. BOLTON and JOHN C. YOO

lead_paragraph: American acceptance of the European Union code of conduct for space would constitute a form of unilateral disarmament.

keywords.value: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament
keywords.name: subject
